org.trellisldp.api

Interface BinaryService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileBinaryService, HttpBasedBinaryService

    public interface BinaryService
    The BinaryService provides methods for retrieving, modifying and checking the validity of binary content.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  BinaryService.MultipartCapable
      A multipart upload-capable interface.
      static class  BinaryService.MultipartUpload
      A multipart upload container.

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

        Optional<InputStream> getContent(IRI identifier,
                                 List<Range<Integer>> ranges)
        Get the content of the binary object.
        Parameters:
        identifier - an identifier used for locating the binary object
        ranges - any segment ranges requested
        Returns:
        the content

        metadata - any user metadata

      • purgeContent

        void purgeContent(IRI identifier)
        Purge the content from its corresponding datastore.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the binary object identifier

      • calculateDigest

        default Optional<String> calculateDigest(IRI identifier,
                                         String algorithm)
        Calculate the digest for a binary object.

        Note: as per RFC 3230, the digest value is calculated over the entire resource, not just the HTTP payload.

        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier
        algorithm - the algorithm
        Returns:
        the digest

      • supportedAlgorithms

        Set<String> supportedAlgorithms()
        Get a list of supported algorithms.
        Returns:
        the supported digest algorithms

      • digest

        Optional<String> digest(String algorithm,
                        InputStream stream)
        Get the digest for an input stream.

        Note: the digest likely uses the base64 encoding, but the specific encoding is defined for each algorithm at https://www.iana.org/assignments/http-dig-alg/http-dig-alg.xhtml

        Parameters:
        algorithm - the algorithm to use
        stream - the input stream
        Returns:
        a string representation of the digest

      • generateIdentifier

        String generateIdentifier()
        Get a new identifier.
        Returns:
        a new identifier
